slash_commands.test-loop: Start background test loop and monitor output
slash_commands.check-tests: Check latest test results from output.log

julia-test-monitor.description: Autonomous test monitoring and failure analysis
julia-test-monitor.use_case: Continuously monitors test output, proactively reports failures, analyzes errors and suggests fixes
julia-test-monitor.when_to_use: For autonomous monitoring while you focus on coding

workflow_description: Tests automatically rerun when source files change. World age errors trigger automatic Julia restart. Parse errors exit the loop.

manual.description: Use slash commands for on-demand control

autonomous.description: Use julia-test-monitor agent for continuous monitoring

ai_agent_instructions.on_code_change: Save the file - tests will automatically rerun
ai_agent_instructions.on_parse_error: Fix the syntax error. The loop has exited, requiring manual restart
ai_agent_instructions.on_world_age_error: Wait for automatic Julia restart (5-10 seconds)
ai_agent_instructions.on_test_failure: Fix the code and save - tests will automatically rerun
